resources.string: Happiest of birthday\'s . You are such a wonderful person and I\'m so lucky to have you in my life. You always make me laugh, support me when I\'m down, and inspire me to be a better version of myself. You deserve all the happiness and love in the world, and I hope this year brings you many amazing opportunities and experiences. Thank you for being you, and for being there for me. You are the best!
